Navigation
Name Rascal/Declarations/Annotation/Selection

Synopsis Retrieve the value of an annotation.
Syntax Expr @ Name
Types
Expr Expr @ Name
T <: node Determined by annotation declaration of Name
Description Retrieves the value of annotation Name of the value of Exp (may be undefined!).
